common.bnb_des: Please use BNB Smart Chain wallet to register an account. This wallet address will be used for deposit.

landing.title: Chiliz Meta Zone

deposit.title: Receive
deposit.direct1: Please use BNB Beacon Chain (BEP2) send CHZ tokens to this wallet address with this memo (If not correct memo, you will lost token).
deposit.direct2: For every 150CHZ, you have registered a system code. If you want to buy multiple codes, you can send token at the same time.
deposit.direct3: After send token, please wait a few minutes.

profile.title: account
profile.note1: Share the link and invite  your friend to Chiliz Meta Zone to build your team.
profile.note2: Share your referral/affiliate ID with a friend who doesn't have an account.
